long_description: Ready to rock and roll this summer? The Columbia Freezer III Dress with Omni-Freeze(R) Zero technology keeps you cool when you're active, whether on the dance floor or at a tropical resort. Omni-Freeze Zero special fabric pulls moist heat away from your body and feels cooler to the touch, so you stay comfortable in hot conditions. Offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Columbia Freezer III Dress features a scoop neck in front and back.
short_description: Ready to rock and roll this summer? The Columbia Freezer III Dress with Omni-Freeze(R) Zero technology keeps you cool when you're active, whether on the dance floor or at a tropical resort.
